34 Gold Standard certified carbon offsets were applied to Scope 1, 2, 
and 3 emissions.
35 Autodesk’s fiscal year 2021 greenhouse gas verification statement can be 
accessed here .
36 In fiscal year 2021, the fleet emissions estimation methodology was 
refined to reflect vehicle‑specific emissions factors. Fiscal year 2020 fleet 
emissions were restated to align with the fiscal year 2021 methodology.
37 Data for fiscal year 2020 and fiscal year 2021 are calculated using the 
market‑based accounting method, which takes into account purchased 
renewable energy offsets.
38 These data are calculated based on the economic input‑output lifecycle 
assessment model, using industry‑specific emissions factors in 
conjunction with Autodesk’s spend. In fiscal year 2021, the US. EPA’s 
environmentally extended input‑output emissions factors are used, and 
fiscal year 2020 emissions were recalculated and restated to align with this 
factor set.
39 Emissions for “capital goods” were calculated based on annual spend.
40 In fiscal year 2021, the FERA emissions calculation methodogy was refined 
to use market‑based factors for the electricity‑related emissions. The fiscal 
year 2020 FERA emissions were recalculated and restated to align with the 
fiscal year 2021 methodology. 
41 Business travel emissions have been calculated using actual data and the 
economic input‑output lifecycle assessment model. In fiscal year 2021, air 
travel data are based on flights flown (rather than transactions), and fiscal 
year 2020 air travel emissions were restated using flights flown to align 
with the fiscal year 2021 methodology.
42 In fiscal year 2021, remote worker GHG emissions are included, and fiscal 
year 2020 remote worker GHG emissions were calculated and added to 
align with the fiscal year 2021 methodology.
43 In fiscal year 2021, the end‑of‑life treatment of sold products emissions 
were less than 0.5 metric tons CO2e and are rounded to zero in this table.
44 Scope 3 indirect energy reported includes energy from remote work, 
events, cloud, and data centers. 
45 Fiscal year 2020 RE100 achieved using previously reported methodologies 
and boundaries.
46 LEED certifications as of January 31, 2021, include facilities in Beijing, 
China; Mumbai, India; Tel Aviv, Israel; Milan, Italy; Singapore; and the 
following in the United States: San Francisco, California; San Rafael, 
California; Boston, Massachusetts.
47 Includes waste from major conferences and facilities. Data are 
extrapolated to our full real estate portfolio based on square footage 
of sites where data are available.
